title: Better than all this endless Marvel type movies!!!
review:
Finally a really good story + real great young actors. Ways better than all these multi million dollar productions I'm so tired of.
A superhero movie for the whole family!

title: loving and exciting
review: My kids loved it and long for a sequel. Children as spectators are taken seriously and the play of the young leading actors is terrific. For me it was finally a kids movie, in which I did not fall asleep.

title: Great film. Great Music. Great humor.
review:
Just returned from the cinema. Unexpected good movie. Even if it is a "kids" film it's worth to watch for everyone. Finally a film not boring for the parents who are "forced" to go with the kids.
Also remarkable: This movie has from the first to the last second a fascinating film music! And last but not least: The final scenes shows that German REALLY have sense of great HUMOR!!!
